title: Meeting the design challenges of the nano-CMOS electronics
impactText: That deep-sub-microns devices can be modelled atomistically and that the results can be used to develop simple circuit models that chip designers can use. Digital/Communication/Information Technologies (including Software),Electronics Economic
findingsText: Circuit designers in analogue design companies can now build simulations of silicon processed that do not yet exist into simulations in order to better design future chips and thus maximise their performance and cost-effectiveness. They have been taken forward via SFC funding and now form part of the design cycle for Wolfson Microelectronics (now part of Cirrus). Digital/Communication/Information Technologies (including Software),Electronics
